data.message: Hey, my sisters account has been hacked, the person has upploaded pictures that are inappropriate for facebook, we need help to erase her account!

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Sara. If your sister can't get into her account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell her to go to the Hacked Accounts section to get immediate help. http://on.fb.me/1GhKhRH. Hope this helps! -Lauren
Sorry it doesn't help, she do not have access to her old e-mail, so she can't do anything from that page.
i give up thank u for not helping me Facebook.

Facebook I've been trying to reach out to you for days now and it has been impossible. There's threats,  harrasment, bullying, racism & more involve and you guys CANNOT take 1 dam minute to take action on this matter? I guess you guys will take some action when someone gets hurt or God forbid,  KILL. ACT NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
